nodes.text: The Thovinack system was located in the Kanz sector, a part of the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It shared its name with the Battle of Thovinack, which took place shortly before the Battle of Yavin.
The Thovinack system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square N-4.
